Data.//: Pure Financed Fee: Intangible Tax (Financed, but non-APR affecting)
Data.//_: The Florida intangible tax is a fee imposed by the state that is
Data.//-: often financed but does not affect the APR. The fee is computed as
Data.//!: a percentage of the principal, but is often expressed in 'mills',
Data.//|: or an amount per thousand. 1 Mill = 0.1 %. In this sample, the
Data.//*: Intangible Tax rate is 2 mills or 0.2%
